3.5. mnclient¶

3.5.1. Module d1_client.mnclient¶

Created:

2011-01-21
Author:

DataONE (vieglais, dahl)
Dependencies:
  • python 2.6

This module implements MemberNodeClient, which extends DataONEBaseClient with functionality specific to Member Nodes.

Classes

DataONEBaseClient(baseurl[, defaultHeaders, ...]) Implements DataONE client functionality common between Member and
MemberNodeClient(baseurl[, defaultHeaders, ...])
